channel.title: Results on University of Michigan Fencing Club
channel.description: Recent content in Results on University of Michigan Fencing Club

item.title: 2021-2022 Season Results
item.description:
USACFC College Fencing National Championships in Providence, RI, Apr 9-10, 2022

Team Results

Full results available on the USACFC website.

Team Overall: 🏆

Men's Overall: 3rd

Women's Overall: 🏆

Men's Epee🥇 Women's Epee🥇
Men's Foil7th Women's Foil🥇
Men's Saber6th Women's Saber🥈

Individual Results

Full results available on Fencing Time Live.

  • Women’s Epee: Amina Troupe, 🥇; Brianna Moglianesi, 🥉
  • Men’s Foil: Alvin Poon, 🥉
  • Women’s Foil: Molly Cavanaugh, 6th; Rachel Hendrian, 8th
  • Women’s Saber: Maggie Koberstein, 🥉

Midwest Fencing Conference Championships at University of Michigan, Mar 26-27, 2022

Team Results

Full results available on Fencing Time Live.

item.title: 2019-2020 Season Results
item.description:
Midwest Fencing Conference Championships
at Ohio State University, Feb 22-23, 2020

Team Results

Team Overall: 🥉 & Schiller Award

Men's Overall: 4th & Schiller Award

Women's Overall: 🥉 & Schiller Award

Men's Epee7th Women's Epee🥉 & Schiller Award
Men's Foil6th Women's Foil🥉 & Schiller Award
Men's Saber🥈 & Schiller Award Women's Saber7th

Individual Results

  • Men’s Foil: Michael Soukar, 8th & Schiller award
  • Men’s Saber: Neo Li, 7th & Schiller award; Thomas Choi, 12th; Zachary Zipper, 13th
  • Women’s Epee: Amina Troupe, 14th & Schiller award
  • Women’s Foil: Molly Cavanaugh, 19th & Schiller award

Wayne State University Duals Feb 8, 2020

Full scoresheets available from Google Drive.
